page.title: 18HEALTH IN NORTH FAREHAM
page.content: One repeated cause for concern from our interviews was the lack of health care in Funtley and N.Fareham,however this seems to be unfounded.There is a health centre with anti-natal clinic and a nurse in constant attendance in Fareham and a smaller clinic in Wickham,both of these within 3 kilometres of the north Fareham block. Health visitors and midwives operate from both clinics and cover the area comprehensively.There is a major hospital,with full emergency and accident facilities,only 10km away on the outskirts of Portsmouth.Knowle Hospital is a psychiatric hospital only,taking it's patients from a wide area of southern England,but it has no accident or emergency department.
